rules.description: Doors in a means of egress must have a minimum clear height of 2032 mm (80 inches) to ensure safe emergency egress, in accordance with IBC Section 1010.1.1.

explanation.on_fail: Fire exit door {guid} has height {lhs} mm, below the required {rhs} mm (IBC 1010.1.1).
explanation.on_pass: Fire exit door {guid} meets the IBC minimum height requirement ({lhs} mm ≥ {rhs} mm, IBC 1010.1.1).
explanation.short: Fire exit doors must provide a clear height of at least 2032 mm (80 in).

rules.name: Fire Exit Door Minimum Height

rules.description: Stairways serving an occupant load of 50 or more must have a minimum clear width of 1118 mm (44 inches) in accordance with IBC Section 1011.2.

explanation.on_fail: Stair flight {guid} has width {lhs} mm, below the required {rhs} mm (IBC 1011.2).

explanation.short: Stairways (for typical occupant loads) must have a minimum clear width of 1118 mm (44 in).

rules.description: Habitable rooms such as bedrooms must have a minimum floor area of 6.5 m² (70 ft²) in accordance with IRC Section R304.1/R304.2.

rules.description: Emergency escape and rescue openings (egress windows) must provide a minimum net clear opening area of 0.53 m² (5.7 ft²) in accordance with IRC Section R310.2.1.
